title: Lakers, Mike McCarthy, Aaron Rodgers, and Kevin Durant
itunes:title: Lakers, Mike McCarthy, Aaron Rodgers, and Kevin Durant
description:
Colin talks about the breaking story of the Los Angeles Lakers dysfunction, the story of former Green Bay Packers HC Mike McCarthy, and the rumor of Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant leaving. Guests include Ric Bucher, Greg Jennings, Stephen Jackson, and Ryan Switzer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
